name: Simple Spy
description: Simple Spy is a dynamic and minimalist 2d platformer. Though Simple Spy is a minimalist platformer,you can also find all fun and essence needed for a full fledged platformer. everything in Simple Spy is achieved through a combination of three action such as running,jumping and rolling.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP , 7 , 8 , 8.1 Processor: 2.2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Video Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Video Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any

reviews.review_text: I wish you could use the Analog controller but its not a dealbreaker (and not just the D-Pad). Nice game that I can see myself playing in short bursts. Seems pretty challenging so far. Controls are not 100% responsive but 98% is good enough. Can def see this getting nicer with a few more updates. I got for free but could easily justify the $2.00 cost. Worth it. Also glad to see a Unity game with such a small footprint. Low powered laptops and system will LOVE this game since you dont need a supercomputer to run it!!
